data.title: SCO Group Definition

The company is a defendant in an action filed on March 6, 2003 in state court in Salt Lake City, Utah by The SCO Group.

Tax Id. #2823; and (b) SCO Operations, Inc., The Debtors are jointly administered under the caption The SCO Group, Inc., et al., Case No. 07-11337 (KG), a Delaware corporation, Fed.

S 520 W Suite 100, Lindon, Utah 84042 Option Number: Plan: ID: Notice is hereby given of the following option grant (the “Option”) to purchase shares of the Common Stock of The SCO Group, Inc.
